DirectoryEntrySync.summary: IMPORTANT Deprecated The DirectoryEntrySync interface represents a directory in a file system. It includes methods for creating, reading, looking up, and recursively removing files in a directory.

blockquote.para:
Warning: This interface is deprecated and is no more on the standard track.
Do not use it anymore. Use the File and Directory Entries API instead.

remarks.para:
-File and Directory Entries API
-Introduction to the File and Directory Entries API
